title: No Lvl 40 Reward
body: I just hit summoner level 40, but didn't get a notification, an emote, or a capsule. I tried restarting client, but that didn't help. Is this a common problem, and what should I do?

replies.body: Got that added for you fam! Be sure to refresh your client if you aren't seeing it ^_^
Got the capsule, and it came with the champ I wanted to buy full price. You're my hero, thank you!

AYYYYYY Sometimes a small problem can turn into a heckin' good time ^_^

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
